問世.definition: to be published; to come out

問事.definition: to ask for information; to inquire

問住.definition: to stump sb with a question

問候.definition: to give one's respects; to send a greeting; (fig.) (coll.) to make offensive reference to (somebody dear to the person to whom one is speaking)

問名.definition: to enquire, according to custom, after the name and horoscope of intended bride; one of a set of six traditional marriage protocols (六禮|六礼), in which name as well as date and time of birth (for horoscope) are formally requested of the prospective bride's family

問好.definition: to say hello to; to send one's regards to

問安.definition: to pay one's respects; to give regards to

問客殺雞.definition: lit. asking guests whether or not to butcher a chicken for them (idiom); fig. hypocritical show of affection (or hospitality)

問寒問暖.definition: (idiom) to show concern about sb's well-being

問心無愧.definition: lit. look into one's heart, no shame (idiom); with a clear conscience

問津.definition: to make inquiries (mostly used in the negative)

問罪.definition: to denounce; to condemn; to call to account; to punish

問罪之師.definition: punitive force; a person setting out to deliver severe reproach

問號.definition: question mark (punct.); unknown factor; unsolved problem; interrogation

問診.definition: (TCM) interrogation, one of the four methods of diagnosis 四診|四诊[si4 zhen3]

問話.definition: to ask sb a question; question

問責.definition: to hold accountable; to blame; to censure; to apportion blame

問路.definition: to ask for directions; to ask the way (to some place)

問道.definition: to ask the way; to ask

問道於盲.definition: lit. to ask a blind man the way (idiom); fig. to seek advice from an incompetent

問題.definition: question; problem; issue; topic; CL:個|个[ge4]

問鼎.definition: to aspire to the throne; to aim at (the first place etc)

問鼎中原.definition: to plan to seize power of the whole country (idiom)

問鼎輕重.definition: lit. to inquire whether the tripods are light or heavy (idiom); a laughable attempt to seize power
